Mobile Software Engineers: Java, C#, C++Be part of the team that develops the top paid iOS app in more than 100 countries and an Android app with more than 100M installs on Google Play! Using your start-up mindset and your experience developing native mobile apps, you will create new, awesome features used by millions of current WhatsApp users. We are looking for mobile developers for all our platforms: iOS, Android, Windows Phone, BlackBerry, and Nokia.Please feel free to contact me below:Currently recruiting for Mobile App Developers- iOS/iPhone Objective C, Android, Java, Windows Phone (C#), C++, BackEnd- Erlang, C - Smart Developers that can get Stuff Done! baspland at whatsapp.comFollow me on twitter:  @baspland
